snippet.title: Grading the SB Nation bloggers NFL mock draft
snippet.description:
Grading the SB Nation bloggers NFL mock draft by Dan Kadar on Apr 18 2014, 11:00a
The draft's top player, Jadeveon Clowney, gets the highest grade from readers. The worst grade shouldn't be a surprise considering the lightning rod nature of the player chosen.

snippet.title: Dominique Easley pro day results: Florida DT moves past ACL injury
snippet.description:
Dominique Easley pro day results: Florida DT moves past ACL injury by Louis Bien on Apr 17 2014, 12:55p
Dominique Easley drew a big crowd to Gainesville for his pro day Thursday. He impressed everyone with his mobility after tearing his right ACL last September.

The Jets have spent the offseason trying to get something, anything from its offensive skill players, with Wednesday's signing of Chris Johnson the latest attempt. We break down the fantasy...

snippet.title: Quotables: Anonymous NFL sources continue to question Jadeveon Clowney's work ethic
snippet.description:
Quotables: Anonymous NFL sources continue to question Jadeveon Clowney's work ethic by Matthew Fairburn on Apr 13 2014, 8:24p
An NFL personnel man was quoted as saying Clowney has "never worked a day in his life."

snippet.title: The Dallas Cowboys are rescheduling preseason games because of One Direction
snippet.description:

A boy band concert at AT&T Stadium is making the Cowboys change their preseason plans.

snippet.title: Brandon Thomas injury: Clemson draft prospect tears ACL
snippet.description:
Brandon Thomas injury: Clemson draft prospect tears ACL by Jeff Gray on Apr 7 2014, 2:46p
Just over a month before the NFL Draft, Thomas has suffered a devastating injury that could cost him millions.
